Title: 🎬 Assassination - Anwar Sadat Anwar Sadat was a general who when...
Description: Assassination - Anwar Sadat Anwar Sadat was a general who was under the shadow of Gamal Abdel Nasser when he came to power in Egypt. Anwar Sadat made many efforts to appear in world politics. Efforts that ranged from war to peace. He was the first Arab leader who broke the taboo of negotiation and peace with Israel. It was this peace that angered radical Muslims and led to his assassination. @iranintltv Video is too big
